name: Dizziness-Be-Gone no Jutsu Version 2.0
desc: Sayu's specialty. The Onigiri has been kneaded by Sayu into a cutesy shape â€” but remember, it's a mujina, not a tanuki, got it? And now that you mention it, this must be how Sayu can sleep for a whole day after eating, right?

customize.name: Recipe: Onigiri
customize.desc: A detailed step-by-step recipe for making Onigiri.

customize.name: Fish
customize.desc: A fresh fillet of fish. Handled properly, it can make a rich dish.

customize.name: Rice
customize.desc: A grain crop commonly found in Teyvat. People of all walks of life enjoy its distinct grainy texture. As the saying goes, "The same kind of rice can feed one hundred kinds of people."

customize.name: Seagrass
customize.desc: A plant that grows in shallow seas. It adds a unique flavor to dishes.

customize.name: Onigiri
customize.desc: A portable dish made with rice. It is simple to make and remains delicious at room temperatures, which has made it very popular with civilians and soldiers alike.

customize.name: Sayu
customize.desc: A pint-sized ninja attached to the Shuumatsuban, who always seems sleep-deprived.

value.text: Restores 26% of Max HP to the selected character and regenerates 570 HP every 5s for 30s.
